recipesJson.name: Papaya Banana Punch
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This recipe packs a bright papaya punch, with a sweet banana chasing after and a light creamy coconut accent. 
diyordievaping.com

reviews.text: Fucking delicious, and full of flavor.

This is an ALL DAY VAPE recipe for sure. It's loaded with flavour and a really delightful combination of these fruits. You've got yourself another winner Wayne. I do recommend this one with an overnight steep. Many thx.
